page.title: 05TELEVISION PROGRAMMES
page.content: T.V.PROGRAMMES. On Tuesday the 11th of June 1985 we could watch television on 4 channels_B.B.C.1 and 2,and I.T.V.and channel 4.Children's T.V.began about 4p.m. and included Caterpillar and Storybook International.The News came next and was followed by some soap operas like Crossroads and Falcon Crest or a comedy Bewitched. Mid_evening there was a police detective series called Miami Vice on B.B.C.1 and on I.T.V. a spy series called Mr.Palfrey of Westminster.There was also one or two quiz programmes and a nature programme called Wildfife on Two about the hedgehog.There was one film_The last ofthe Great Survivors.The News came on at 9p.m. on B.B.C.1 and 10p.m. on I.T.V.Later programmes were documentaries or short comedies.
